bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a rather serious variant of depletion. Su wen 素問 40: 病名血枯，此得之年少 時，有所大脫血，若醉入房中，氣竭肝傷，故月事衰少不來也 , “The disease is named blood withering. It is acquired in younger years either [because of] a massive loss of blood or [because] one has entered the chambers [for sexual intercourse] in a state of drunkenness [with the result that] the qi is exhausted and the liver is harmed. Hence, the monthly affair is weak and diminished and fails to arrive”.
